talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
We should go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past.
What are you waiting for?

$Geraint$
Go through the Forest of Little Shadows, to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past.
What are you waiting for?

$Geraint$
He should have just wrote everything in one book.
(Go through the Forest of Little Shadows to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past)

$Geraint$
He should have just wrote everything in one book.
(Go through the Forest of Little Shadows to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past)

$Geraint$
This place is as barren as before.
…It's strange to think that a villain had a past too. What we read until now was almost like a hero novel.
You said humans change, but if they change so easily then how can we differentiate the bad from the good?

${user_nick}$
Erm... Actually there's no bad person if we look at the past... There's a famous saying that "Every why has a wherefore"...
The bad guys are bad guys because they do bad things at the present time.

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9564_qu_01.ogg}
Then if a bad guy does a good thing tomorrow, then he can become a good guy again?

${user_nick}$
I don't think it's possible overnight. You just saw how Feder and Rubinart reconciled. If you don't apologise for the wrongs and take responsibility, things won't change no matter how many kind acts you do. Especially if you don't make up for those whose lives were destroyed by your evil deeds...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You should know what is bad in the first place...)</html>
<html>....(Yeah, you were just being a child....)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
So it's compensation, apology, then reconciliation?
Sounds tough. We shouldn't do bad things in the first place. Well, I didn't do anything particularly bad ever since I was born!
(Geraint says it with pride)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Yeah, you're kind-hearted by nature so I guess it's all right)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Of course, I'm sorry about eating Argenta's snacks without telling her.

${user_nick}$
Well, there are different kinds of bad and good deeds in the world, and it depends on the circumstances too. You will have a clearer idea when you see and learn more things. You're still young, so I guess you'd have a harder time thinking about those issues.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It's a proof that you're growing up.</html>
<html>Excuse me, I'm not an adult either.</html>
<html>(Though even adults are confused at times...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9564_qu_02.ogg}
Hmm... So it's because I'm young...?
Hmph, well good for you and the grown ups. I have too many thoughts on my mind lately that my head is aching.

$Geraint$
(Geraint flips the pages of the book that he saw last time)
Hey look. It really has pages that we didn't see before. This is cool!

${user_nick}$
(The book...)

${user_nick}$
…(It really seems to be the case. Read the book.)

$Rubinart's Book$
My dear friend, forgive me for troubling you to find the books in various places.
I'm doing this just in case it is not you who find these books so I hope you understand.
I really hope I can see you again. You're one of few beings that I found lovely.

$Rubinart's Book$
Now let me write a story about the times you and I spent together.
My dearest friend…

$Rubinart's Book$
White Dragon, Iona.

${user_nick}$
…Ionaaaaa?!?!?!? I suspected a little but, IONA??? Iona never told me that he was friends with Rubinart!!! Besides, Iona is…!

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9564_qu_03.ogg}
Iona!? Why is that name appearing here? I thought he's dead.
Come on, read on and tell me what's going on!

$Rubinart's Book$
I found you there in icy cold Hafling, quietly stuck in the snow with your tiny jewel held tightly in your arms...
I thought something happened to your jewel, so I dug you out of the snow to rescue you and asked for your name.
But oh shocks! Instead of replying me you burst into tears.

$Rubinart's Book$
You looked at me with tears in your eyes and said [Ah... My jewel... My jewel broke into pieces and it's scattered all over the place now...] and cried for a long time. Then you introduced yourself to me, saying that you were a fragment that had Chaos Dragon's memories before it was corrupted.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_01.ogg}
Do you feel better now, kid? Tell me your name.

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_01.ogg}
I… don't have such thing… … No… My memory… Though you can say I'm a Chaos Dragon, I'm not really a Chaos Dragon either… Then… Why would someone like me need a name… I… I… I don't need a name... Just call me White Dragon…!! Don't look at me… I feel ashamed for becoming like this…

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
What? Relax boy. Name is an important thing. It's the first clue for remembering who you are.

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_02.ogg}
I don't want you to remember me…. Leave me alone… I shouldn't be remembered... I... I should disappear... Ancient Dragon is not even around anymore... Why should I!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_03.ogg}
Listen kid! (Rubinart raises his voice like he's angry)
You have something great like the Chaos Dragon's memory! Don't say such things!! I know an Elf who's been looked down by everyone but persevered to become the strongest Elf around! If you don't have a name, you should make a cool name for yourself and lead a cool life!

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_03.ogg}
Don't say that when you know nothing about me…!!! If it wasn't me, this continent... this continent would be…!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_04.ogg}
What an irritating kid. I don't like kids who talk too much. Let me see... What spell can I use... (Rubinart mutters a spell and White Dragon stops moving)

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_04.ogg}
Huh?? What's this?! I can't move my body! Hey let me go!!
(Flustered White Dragon tries to free himself)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_05.ogg}
You're so noisy… I hate persuading kids like you. I'll just tell you a story about an amazing Elf that I know. You'll realise that you're extremely blessed when you hear her story, you idiot. (Rubinart covers White Dragon's mouth and starts talking)

$Archer Meriendel$
(Meriendel is sitting at a desk in front of Rubinart. In front of her, there is are books on ancient characters that Rubinart gave her. She concentrates so quietly that even her breating can be heard. After staring at her for a while, Rubinart opens his mouth.)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_06.ogg}
You're really strange, you know that?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_01.ogg}
(Meriendel lifts her head and looks at Rubinart. As always, her eyes closed.)
What is strange, Rubinart?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_07.ogg}
Humans usually give up soon when I teach them something, saying that they've learnt enough and there's nothing more to learn. Then they forget me. But you're so persistent. I've taught you much more than what I taught the humans before, yet you remain the same. It's strange.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_02.ogg}
So you don't like that?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_08.ogg}
(Rubinart shakes his head) Of course not. Your attitude... is what I wanted from the humans. You apologised for being rude when you met me for the first time, and you've been very polite to me ever since. It just caught my attention... Are all the Elves the same?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_03.ogg}
Hmm... (Meriendel thinks for a while)
I don't think so. There are many kinds of Elves too. As for my attitude towards learning... it's only natural because I know so much less than you. It's natural that I learn from you. I can see more things when I know more.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_09.ogg}
You see more things when you know more...
I see. Though I don't fully understand what that means, I think I roughly do. Then I should learn something from you too.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_04.ogg}
What? Learn something from me?
Wow, ask me anything.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_10.ogg}
Why are you Meriendel?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_05.ogg}
Huh? Why do you ask that....
(Meriendel looks like she doesn't understand why Rubinart is asking such question)
Oh, you mean my name? Right, you told me the meaning of your name last time.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_11.ogg}
Argh why am I so tongue-tied... Huh? Yeah... I think that's what I meant. Haha.
(Rubinart is flustered unlike his usual self)

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_06.ogg}
…I was a twisted fruit to begin with, and remained to be so until I grew up to be an Elf.
I was an ugly Elf just before it was fallen… Everyone despised me. But luckily, they decided to take my life only when I was completely a fallen fruit so that earned me time. An old Elf was assigned to take care of me afterwards.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_07.ogg}
The old Elf hated me and treated me with disgust... and naturally, she didn't want to take care of me. She acted as if I didn't exist. It was her who gave me the name Meriendel. Though it sounds like a nice name...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_08.ogg}
It's actually the name of a small parasitic flower that lives off the nutrients of another tree. When Meriendels grow near a tree, people get rid of them so that the tree will not lose its nutrients and grow well. I must have been such a loathsome child for her to have given me such a name.

$Archer Meriendel$
Since I was born as an abnormal fruit, I was blind and I couldn't fully control my body when I became an Elf. I desperately worked hard because I wanted to see the world. I practised shooting arrows day and night and I could finally shoot like the normal Elves. My efforts were noticed by the Queen by chance, and she made me her bodyguard. The other Elves still hated me...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_10.ogg}
The Queen offered to give me a new name, but Pala Telesia... I thought maybe it's my telesia to be named Meriendel so I kept it... Sometimes other Elves tease me about it. Of course, I beat them up when they do that haha. Funny, isn't it?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_12.ogg}
…No, not at all… Why the heck is it like that?!
You tried so hard to live, why didn't the other Elves recognise your efforts?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_11.ogg}
Well that's because... I was missing many things compared to the other Elves.
But I still found favour with the Queen...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_13.ogg}
…WHAT!!
I don't like that. I'll burn all the Elves who insulted you and get you the apologies you deserve even if I have to skin them alive!! How could you have just let them be? You're strong enough to kill them!!

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_12.ogg}
…Rubinart, it's unlike you to be so agitated.
We're not like you so when we die... that's it. So we try to live a fulfilling life because we only have one life. No one is entitled to take away the right to live.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_14.ogg}
But still!! They are wrong to look down on a great Elf like you!! You're so humble and beautiful and so wise... (Rubinart rambles on and on. He seems to be blushing a little too.)

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_13.ogg}
(Meriendel turns to Rubinart like she's surprised) Ah, I've never heard such praises before... Th-thank you, Rubinart. Erm... I don't know what to say right now. (Meriendel's face turns red)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_15.ogg}
Wh-whatever...! I said that because it's true so I'm not going to apologise. Wait a minute, I don't have to apologise for praising you. Gee, I have to be extra careful when I talk to you because my words get jumbled up. I keep thinking about you all the time too...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_14.ogg}
Oh, that seems very much like how I feel when I talk to Feder. I thought I was sick, but it's impossible for a dragon to get such sickness so... I guess I'm not sick. So what's wrong with us...
(Meriendel seems curious)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_16.ogg}
WHAT?? Ah, I mean... I see...
(Rubinart forces a smile)
Anyway, I will continue to teach you to my best knowledge if you keep learning like this, so tell me if you need anything. I'll do anything for you.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_17.ogg}
The Goddess is sleeping now anyway, so I, the oldest dragon around, am the greatest being in this world! Feel free to ask me anything! (Rubinart smiles confidently)

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_15.ogg}
…Erm…(Meriendel hesitates for a while before opening her mouth) Rubinart, since you're a strong dragon, have you been to the end of the world?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_18.ogg}
The end of the world? I've been to the end of the continent many times.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_16.ogg}
No, another wider world beyond our continent. There are many worlds in the mythologies too. Sometimes I feel that our continent is too small. Even an Elf like me can travel to almost all corners of this continent.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_17.ogg}
So I thought maybe I can go beyond this continent if I'm accompanied by a strong and wise dragon like you... Haha, it's just one of the things I dream about. But what can a small flower like me do even when I get there...
(Meriendel waves her hand like she's waving away an absurd dream, but Rubinart smiles)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_19.ogg}
…Why not? We don't know what kind of flowers we might find there. We can fill that place with Meriendels and you'll become the prettiest flower! And if you just say a word, I can burn all the other flowers there too…

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_18.ogg}
(Meriendel quickly covers Rubinart's mouth with her hand)
Uh uh, don't be so violent, Rubinart. You're a corrupted dragon but you're much wiser than that. You shouldn't say such things so lightly.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_20.ogg}
….(Rubinart brushes Meriendel's hand away with his face turned steaming red)
F-f-fine! Gee, I can't win you. Hey, it's almost time. Didn't you say you're meeting Feder?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_19.ogg}
Oh you're right. But…(Meriendel looks at Rubinart for a while, but Rubinart waves with a smile).

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_21.ogg}
It's okay. I have plenty of time so I'll wait for you. I'll be lying around in my cave so come when you're done.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_9564_qu_20.ogg}
All right. See you later, Rubinart.(Meriendel walks away)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_22.ogg}
...(After checking that Meriendel left, he bangs his head on the wall)
Gah, what the heck did I say just now? My face was so hot that I don't remember what I said... Is this... Is this really the love sickness that the humans sing about? How can a dragon like me catch such sickness... This is making me crazy...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…I feel like slapping myself... Besides, what did Meriendel say? What? Feder? So you like Feder, huh? But why is she trying to hide her feelings? Or maybe she really doesn't know... Oh I don't know either... I think I lived with the humans for too long. The old me would have sneered at a human who acted like what I'm doing now... What has happened to me, seriously...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_23.ogg}
…When you realise your feelings for Feder, will you go to him? Of course, I can wait for you because I will live much longer then Feder. But... But Feder has a fiancee!! What are you going to do, Meriendel...? (Rubinart quietly stares at the direction Meriendel went to)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_24.ogg}
…That's what happened. Hah... Seriously, why did Meriendel...
Everything would have been much better if Meriendel just liked me back.
Seriously, I'm much more good looking than Feder...

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_05.ogg}
………Erm, why are you telling me all this?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_25.ogg}
Huh? Hmm... Maybe I just wanted to brag about her?
Eh... Just take it as a ramble of a heartbroken lovestruck dragon…
(Rubinart smiles bitterly)

$White Dragon$
………….
(He's at a loss for words. But after looking at Rubinart's bitter smile, he tries hard not to make him more agitated)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_26.ogg}
…Ah really... I always sidetrack whenever I talk about Meriendel….
It's so unlikely of me... This is serious, I think I caught a severe sickness…
(White Dragon seems taken aback when he sees Rubinart covering his face with his hands)

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_06.ogg}
Erm... You're a fragment of Chaos Dragon but... You're very much like a human…
That makes me feel a little better. Maybe I'll become like that after some time too…
We have hope I guess…
(White Dragon tries his best to comfort Feder)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Wah really?!
Amazing!! You're the first one who responded like that when I talked about Meriendel! Is it because you have Chaos Dragon's memory? You sure are broad-minded! (Rubinart frees White Dragon from the spell and lifts him up in the air and turns round and round)

$White Dragon$
…Erm, so... I'm the first one… Well, people will usually be thinking you're weird when they hear such things….
Erm, I'm getting a little dizzy here. Can you put me done, Rubinaaaa….
(White Dragon's eyes are spinning)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_27.ogg}
…Fantastic! I've decided to give you a name!
I think you'll be a very good dragon friend of mine!

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_07.ogg}
…F-friend?
But I… Although I would very much like a friend, I…
(White Dragon hesitates)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_28.ogg}
…!! I just thought of a cool name! It struck me like lightning!!! How about "Iona"? It goes well with my name too! I specially thought of something that would go well with my name!!
(Rubinart seems very proud of his naming sense)

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_08.ogg}
…Iona…? What's that? Does it have a meaning?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9564_qu_29.ogg}
…It means snowflake! You're small and white! It goes well with my name which means red traces, fresh blood, and red camellia on a snowfield. We both are what makes a winter day beautiful! Isn't it a cool name? I named myself too, but I think Iona and Rubinart are the finest names that could ever be around.

$White Dragon${sound:npc_Iona_9564_qu_09.ogg}
…Iona… Then I'm White Dragon Iona…? Hehe, it's a beautiful name. I don't know if I am allowed to feel this way but... It gives me the feeling that I have a friend... That makes me shy too…(Iona quickly covers his blushing face with his gloved hands)

$Rubinart's Book$
Don't you think I'm too generous? I told an interesting story and even named a dragon I've seen for the first time... And the Chaos memories you had really helped. Without you, I wouldn't have a clue about Mistland. By the way...

$Rubinart's Book$
I hope you can read on to the ending. Follow the series you read just now….
I'm sure you already know, but we…
(The book has ended. Talk to Geraint)

$Geraint$
It seems like he forced the little kid into becoming his friend... Did this dragon called Iona know Mistland well? Did you hear anything about Mistland from him?

${user_nick}$
…No, Iona didn't tell me much about Mistland... He only said it's filled with poison…

$Geraint${sound:npc_GeraintKid_9564_qu_04.ogg}
Indeed. No matter how strong you are, you're just an ordinary adventurer afterall so he must have felt you're not good enough to share such important information. Or maybe you weren't as close to him as you thought you were…

$Geraint$
I… guess…

$Geraint$
or maybe not,
…………………………………I'm sorry. Maybe he just didn't remember?
(Geraint turns away and tries to avoid eye contact)

${user_nick}$
Ah, that must be why. Come to think of it, he did mention that his memory was missing here and there. Iona was really nice, unlike you.

$Geraint$
……………………(Mumbles quietly to himself) How can you say that!?
Let's go and find the next book. He told us to follow the same order so it must be at the Corridor of Tangled Memories.

${user_nick}$
I'll tell you more about Iona someday. I realised it now that he was just around your height too….
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

$Geraint$
…I'm not interested!!
I've heard enough about him! If you say another word about that Chaos Dragon, I'm gonna be angry! And I'll be much taller than him so shut up!! (Geraint pouts)

$Rubinart's Book$
Though I didn't tell you that time, Meriendel later came to know about her feelings for Feder. She cried for days and nights saying that her feelings were wrong. I thought she would stop loving Feder, but I guess that was hard. So I could do nothing but wait... I thought things would be better if I waited, but that's when it all happened. I'll tell you more in the next book... (The book has ended. Talk to Geraint)

journal.title: Dragon's Name 1
journal.contents:
Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past with Geraint and find the book.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Geraint)
journal.destination: To the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Quest has been added. Go to Crossroad of Hesitant Past.

journal.title: Dragon's Name 2
journal.contents:
You've found the book. Take a look.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: Read the book at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past

journal.title: Dragon's Name 3
journal.contents:
Rubinart keeps writing about what happened in the past… Keep reading Rubinart's Book.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: Read the book at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Rubinart started thinking about the past. Listen to his story.

journal.title: Dragon's Name 4
journal.contents:
What seemed like Rubinart's love story has ended. Finish reading the book.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: Read the book at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Rubinart's recollections ended. Read his story.

journal.title: Dragon's Name 5
journal.contents:
It was Rubinart who gave Iona his name.
Finish reading the book.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart's Book)
journal.destination: Read the book at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past

journal.title: Dragon's Name 6
journal.contents:
Rubinart's Book has ended.
Talk to Geraint.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Geraint)
journal.destination: Talk to Geraint at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
